website_summaries.verdict: Suede ankle boots that require patience to break in.
pros: People love that these boots don't hurt feet even after walking for hours
The suede adds a fashionable touch
cons: Can take a while to break them in until you get used to them

customer_reviews.title: I love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these booties. The fit is very comfortable. I was a little apprehensive about purchasing these boots because I thought that they may look cheap in person. They look very good. The red boots are actually suede & not the manmade material stated in the description.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Sexy And dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Definitely higher heel than expected so I made it through the wedding but when I stood up to go to the reception my foot cramped and I almost ate floor. I’m usually good in heels but I was not. Nothing wrong with the shoe but be prepared for the complete inability to move your foot.
customer_reviews.author: KariAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous boot! Get them!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are GOURGEOUS!! I have in the black as well. I'm usually 6.5-7 & bought in 7 & they fit perfect. I love how these have a higher shaft because they look great with skirts. They look great w/ skinny jeans too-just gotta roll them up a bit more. The suede is beautiful & they are made well. It is a high heel but I wore them out & I was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Higher Baby

customer_reviews.title: ... shoes fit true to size and are even more beautiful in person that in the picture
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit true to size and are even more beautiful in person that in the picture. The color is very vibrant. I got lots of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Tamia

customer_reviews.title: Very classy
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect ,the quantity was good the zipper worked perfect. The packaging was very nice it even came with extra heel replacements .
customer_reviews.author: Maria Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice Red suede boots 7.5
customer_reviews.text: I order a 7.5 (with a lil bit of room) and they fit the ankles well which I didn't think they would, but glad they do...I just need the black ones now😉
customer_reviews.author: Nee Nee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boots
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these boots, very well made , very sexy.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: My BOOTS CAME IN WITH SCUFFS ALL OVER THEM.
customer_reviews.text: both of my boots arrived with scuffs all over them. i’m so disappointed. be careful ordering from them, i hesitates initially, i wish i would have went with my first gut feeling.
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing booties
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful. I received so many compliments. These are my new favorites booties
customer_reviews.author: Francisca Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Crazy enough these are comfortable. After walking around for like 5 hours my ...
customer_reviews.text: Crazy enough these are comfortable. After walking around for like 5 hours my feet finally started hurting. I'm with them 100%. They fit as expected to whatever your shoe size is. I'm a 10 and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chi8

customer_reviews.title: Boot season
customer_reviews.text: I love these booties they are comfortable and I suggest wear thin sock or no sock if you have average feet the fit to my feet perfect no space in between. Pic was off guard I was telling my daughter hold on 🤦🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Divine Queens

product_meta.title: Steve Madden Women's Wagner Ankle Bootie
product_meta.description:
Make any ensemble instantly sexy with wagner, a timelessly fierce bootie featuring a tall stiletto heel, pointed toe and shiny patent surfaces. style as a seductive punctuation to skinny jeans or a midi skirt.

What began as a modest $1100 investment in 1990 has developed into one of the most iconic brands in footwear. From a factory in Queens, NY, Steve Madden has revolutionized the shoe industry, merging years of experience with unique and creative designs. Inspired by rock and roll and his New York roots, his vision to provide on-trend women and men with an outlet to express their individuality is innovative, daring, and inspiring. Steve’s innate understanding of trends and unparalleled willpower have resulted in millions of customers worldwide and propelled his designs to the forefront of fashion. He has expanded the Steve Madden brand into a true lifestyle and destination for footwear, handbags and accessories, sold in over 80 countries worldwide. It’s about authenticity. It’s about embracing individuality. It’s Steve Madden.
feature_bullets: 4.5 inch heel height. Patent PU upper material
